alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 19 at 2:26PM MST until February 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow, blowing snow, and flash freeze expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Strong easterly winds, blowing snow, and quickly freezing road surfaces will impact travel on Sunday. Winds gusting to 40 mph will be common. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
